title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Social Protection) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister social protection) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Craig Dwyer, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Craig Dwyer, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Social Protection, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to the Minister for Social Protection, with effect from 24 February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
19 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [86] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6

r-phost: publications@opw.ie
